title: Benefits of Meditation | Wellness Center | University of Illinois at Chicago
text: Today’s Wellness tip is meditation! As we work on mending our mental health, please use meditation as a resource to cope with all the stress!
In this new journey, please know it’s okay to “mess up” and wonder, but as long as you keep up with, you can reap the benefits!
The goal is to practice meditation as frequently as possible aim for 4x a week for about at least 10 min a day! (5 min if need be)
Please read below for the benefits of mindfulness meditation!
Please know there are many different forms of meditation, and whichever you choose to endeavor in has its own range of benefits.

You’re not trying to turn off your thoughts or feelings. You’re learning to observe them without judgment. And eventually, you may start to better understand them as well.
